Uses of Package
org.js4ms.server

  • Classes in org.js4ms.server used by org.js4ms.server 
    Class and Description
    Connection
    An abstract base class for persistent client-server connections.
    ConnectionHandler
    Base class for objects that manage the serialization of messages over a Connection.
    ConnectionHandlerFactory
    Interface exposed by objects that construct ConnectionHandler objects.
    ConnectionManager
    Manages a collection of active Connection objects.
    Server
    Basic server application that accepts TCP connection requests and delegates connection handling to a Service object that is supplied to a server when it is constructed.
    ServerFactory
    Interface exposed by objects that contruct Server objects.
    Service
    Interface exposed by objects that service messages received on a Connection.
